title: Stormingo!
description: Stormingo doesn't look like any of the other birds in the marsh. Everyone wonders why, including Stormingo. What will Stormingo do when her mother answers her questions? Students will learn about friendship in this sweet story filled with detailed illustrations. The book can also be used to teach students how to determine an author's purpose for writing and the proper use of quotation marks.
reviewWords: alone, flamingo, friend, hippopotamus, stork, strange
grammar: Quotation Marks                : Recognize and use quotation marks
